highlands.description: Uneven valleys and tall cliffs with many lakes and rivers. Default home of the Mountain Folk.

spring.description: Spring in the Highlands is a time of renewal, usually full of windy days and a good time to start sowing. Late snow may rarely occur.

summer.description: Summer in the Highlands is a warm and wet season, often with days of rain and maybe even storms. Strong winds and a cloudless sky will probably prevail, however.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Highlands marks the end of the farming season, with several rainy or cloudy days and perhaps even an early snowfall.

winter.description: Winter in the Highlands can be harsh and severe, lasting slightly longer than the other seasons and with an almost daily snowfall. Get your warm clothes ready!

snow_early.description:
Snow has come earlier this year...
  • Plant growth speed is slightly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.

snow_late.description:
There's still snow to fall this year...
  • Plant growth speed is somewhat reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

snow_early_positive.tooltip: I've waited the whole year for this, the snow season is finally upon us!

snow_early_negative.tooltip: Can't believe we're getting snow this early, darkness and cold approaches!

snow_late_positive.tooltip: I'm glad we can enjoy one more day of snow before the snow season ends!

snow_late_negative.tooltip: Winter should be over already, can't believe we're getting such late snowfall...

none.description: There's no ore in detection range below this point.

some.description: There's some ore below this point, but it might be pretty far down.

lots.description: There's a lot of ore below this point, or it's very close to the surface.

tons.description: You're sitting on a gold mine! (But possibly other ores than gold.)

none.description: Either there's no wilderness here, or it's eclipsed by buildings.

little.description: This area is very tame. Try planting trees to *spruce* it up a bit.

some.description: There's some wilderness here, but it won't attract many animals. A few more or larger plants could help.

lots.description: This area is rather wild, and plenty of animals should be attracted to it.

tons.description: It's a veritable Garden of Eden!

big_game.name: Big Game
big_game.description: Large animals produce large cuts of meat, jerky, pelts, and other useful items

rabid_bear.description: There is something unnatural and wrong with this animal...

large_bear.description: This is a very large bear.

slaughter.description: Harvest this wild animal for some of its resources.
slaughter.disabled_description: This wild animal is unfit for slaughtering.

moonbell_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the herbs are lost in the process.

marblesprout_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the flower is lost in the process.

marblesprout_drying_recipe.description: Dry marblesprout flowers to form a hunk of stone used in ornate furniture.

bolete_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

chanterelle_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

winter_morel_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

desert_truffle_colony_recipe.description: Use existing fungus to create more colonies to grow into new fungi.

bone_clay_recipe.description: Required for creating porcelain and beautiful ornate ceramics.

copper_wall_lantern_recipe.description: A beautiful lantern. Place on buildings to provide light at night.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: A small lantern that's placed on the ground. Suitable for lighting paths or small gardens.

mining_helmet.description: A protective iron hat that also includes a light source.

mining_helmet_iconic.description: Can be used by a Worker for additional efficiency. Also provides light.

nutty_poultry_recipe.description: Stirred and fried large poultry slices with spices and nuts.
nutty_poultry_recipe.flavor: Very popular among the hearthlings from the East!

cherry_tart_recipe.description: A delicious and fresh dessert for lazy afternoons.

pie_cherry_recipe.description: A tasty pie that is quite difficult to make.

nut_pralines_recipe.description: Crunchy nuts baked with a delightful caramelized sugar crust.

huntsman_banquet_recipe.description: An exquisite cut of venison seasoned with fruity forest flavors.

cooked_nuts_recipe.description: Shaven and tenderly cooked edible seeds like pines and acorns.

broth_recipe.description: A very nutritious and filling simmer, broth is both an ingredient or a meal on its own.

bone_marrow_recipe.description: Extremely nutritious roast made with animal bones.

boiled_shrooms_recipe.description: Boiling mushrooms will remove most of their impurities and improve their consistency.

shroom_omelette_recipe.description: A satisfying and tasty dish that is also easy to make.

roast_steak_recipe.description: The most prized and delicious cut of meat, slowly grilled on fire.

simple_hatch_wooden.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_clay.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_stone.description: A simple hatch for vertical doorways.

simple_hatch_iron.description: A simple, but sturdy, hatch for vertical doorways.

diagonal_hatch_iron.description: Thick, sturdy iron hatch for your cellar.

reinforced_clay_door.flavor: Gives a slight feeling of safety

reinforced_wooden_door_lockable.description: Stronger than your average door and lockable.

reinforced_clay_door_lockable.description: Stronger than your average door and lockable.

reinforced_stone_door_lockable.description: Stronger than your average door and lockable.

moonbell_crop.description: Can be used as a healing herb

003.name: Moonbell
003.description: Beauty is its own reward. (So shiny!)

003.name: Marblesprout
003.description: Beauty is its own reward (Rock solid)

cotton_crop.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread

000.name: Cotton Seedling
000.description: A long journey ahead for this one.

002.name: Cotton Bud
002.description: Growing steadily! Should start blooming anytime!

003.name: Cotton Bloom
003.description: It's flowering! Enjoy it while it lasts...

005.name: Immature Cotton
005.description: The plant is drying and the cotton should be mature soon!

moonbell.description: An herb commonly used for medicinal purposes

marblesprout.description: An uncommon herb that will harden and turn into marble when dried.

marble_stone.description: Used by masons to make really pretty stone works!

feldspar_stone.description: A not so ordinary rock, feldspar can be used to create porcelain

thatch_bale.description: Dry grass that can be turned into fodder or used as thatch in crafting.

bear_pelt.description: A large fur from a ferocious creature.

bone_material.description: Common bones from an average creature

bone_clay_mound.description: Use it in pottery to make really pretty porcelain!

cotton_bundle.description: Soft to the touch. Spinnable into thread

lock.flavor: Look out to not lock someone out

tree_birch_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a giant tree

ancient_yew_tree.description: As beautiful as it is old, it feels almost magical...

patrol_point_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

patrol_point_tower_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

patrol_point_sign_recipe.flavor: With this you can now control your footmens :D

moonbell_plant.description: Can be harvested for healing herbs
moonbell_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

moonbell_plant_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into healing herbs

moonbell_plant_sprout.description: Just need some time and care.

moonbell_plant_bud.description: Its almost there! Look, it has buds!

marblesprout_plant.description: This plant can be harvested for Marble Stones!
marblesprout_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and has not grown back yet

marblesprout_plant_seed_ghost.description: Once planted, it will grow into a Marblesprout

marblesprout_plant_sprout.description: Just need some time and care.

marblesprout_plant_bud.description: Its almost there! Look, it has buds!

cherry_bush_plant_bud.description: It's almost there! Look, it has buds!

cherry_bush_plant_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a bush of delicious cherry plums.

cherry_bush_plant_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

cotton_plant.unripe_description: This plant has been harvested and hasn't grown back yet.
cotton_plant.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread.

cotton_plant_bud.description: It's almost there! Should start blooming soon.

cotton_plant_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

cotton_plant_seed.description: Can be planted to grow fiber which can be spun into thread.

cotton_plant_bloom.description: Look at all the blooms! They shall fade away quickly...

cotton_plant_fading.description: The blooms are fading... But it shall give cotton buds soon!

cotton_plant_maturing.description: The cotton buds have started maturing and shall be ready soon enough!

statue_anji_the_horrendous_ghost.description: It is said that Anji bravely fought a pack of wolves under the last radiant sun.

wombat.description: Its fluffiness inspired the art school known as plushinism. It only eats greens.

cherry_basket.description: Sweet or sour, a tasty fruit for any hour.

cherry_serving.description: A cherry is always on top, even when there's nothing below.

huntsman_banquet.description: A perfectly roasted venison prepared with a bittersweet woodland sauce.

broth.description: Very nutritious but not really exciting.

bone_marrow.description: Extremely nutritious but definitely not satisfying.

chanterelle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

desert_truffle_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

bolete_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

winter_morel_basket.description: Delicious mushrooms ready to be eaten!

boiled_shrooms.description: A simple yet satisfying boiling of diverse mushrooms.

shroom_omelette.description: Slightly more satisfying than your regular omelette.

steak.description: A high quality piece of raw prime meat.

roast_steak.description: A very fine and premium piece of roasted meat.

pasture_grass.description: Tall grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for later use.

overgrown_pasture_grass.description: Overgrown grass can be grazed on by animals or harvested for later use.

short_pasture_grass.description: Short grass can be grazed on by animals but isn't long enough for thatching.

sprouting_pasture_grass.description: Grass has just started germinating here, not yet as efficient for grazing.

chanterelle_ghost.description: A group of delicious edible mushrooms

chanterelle_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

chanterelle_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

chanterelle_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

desert_truffle_ghost.description: Hearty mushrooms that can thrive among the roots of flowers

desert_truffle_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

desert_truffle_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

desert_truffle_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

bolete_ghost.description: A tasty and coveted forest delicacy

bolete_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

bolete_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

bolete_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

winter_morel_ghost.description: A very sought of northern fungi that tastes great!

winter_morel_colony.description: Can be placed to grow into larger, edible mushrooms

winter_morel_spreading.description: The spores have dispersed from the colony and the mushrooms started growing

winter_morel_developing.description: The fungi are sprawling and will soon be large enough!

craftsdwarf_party.description: An industrious folk will never let go of their most prized advancements on embarkment and the Artificer is definitely the top of craftsdwarvenship.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: Gets you started early with the most advanced crafts.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower

grower_trowel_equipped.description: Can be used by a Grower for their crafts and to tend plant and fungus alike.

artificer_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer

artificer_staff_equipped.description: An advanced device that can channel both the powers of the Hearth and of machines.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: A highly traditional dwarven meal made with varanus meat and local cherries.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: A sign of home for all of the mountain folk!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: For some it is between the old ways and the new that the mountain folk will find glory!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Balance, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: It is the belief of many of the mountain folk that only through fire and industry there is progress.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: Many of the mountain folk will always follow the old ways.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its blessing.

sweet_varanus.description: An exotic specialty of the dwarven cuisine.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: A delicious and traditional meat dish.

heatmap.title: heatmap
heatmap.description: This is the heatmap tooltip. TODO: put something useful here.

ore.description: Detect ore beneath the surface: areas appear brighter where ore is abundant or close to the surface.

wilderness.description: See where the world is wilder (or tamer).

gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: When crafting an item, the crafters will check the inventory to see if there is sufficient of ingredients to use. If not, then they will add more orders to the queue should they need to to fulfill the original order.

toggle_training_off.description: Turn off training for this soldier. They will still patrol and fight as normal.

toggle_training_on.description: Enable training for this soldier. They will still fight as normal, but will prefer training on training dummies over patrolling up to level 3.
